short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the Local.com New Tab Chrome™ extension and get quick search results on your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Configure your new tab with the Local.com extension to enjoy a clutter-free search experience.

On your home page, you can check the current weather, get inspired with daily wallpapers, and access popular sites with just a click. 

Permissions: 
Replace the page you see when opening a new tab: We take this permission to update your homepage with wallpapers, weather and search powered by local.com.

If this product fails to meet your requirements, note that it can be uninstalled at any time. Your feedback will help us improve.

By clicking the button above, I agree to abide by the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy and to install this Chrome™ extension.

Chrome is a trademark of Google LLC. Use of it here does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by Google LLC.

Privacy Policy: https://www.local.com/content/local_privacy.php
Terms of Service: https://www.local.com/content/local_terms_and_conditions.php
